column4: I am trying to convert a AVI DivX file into VCD, to play in my DVD Player. I am using AVIDEMUX, but the VCD MPEG file finishes with 790MB, what makes impossible to burn on a CD. And I can't find the option to "set a file size"... can someone help me, please??
but DVD won't finish with a lot more than 790mb?
devede is the name of the program? hehe ok, gonna search for it
